# Hyperscalper

> Advanced scalping terminal for Hyperliquid DEX. 100% client-side — your keys never leave your browser.

Hyperscalper is a professional-grade cryptocurrency trading terminal built specifically for scalping on [Hyperliquid](https://hyperliquid.xyz), the leading on-chain perpetuals DEX. It runs entirely in the browser with zero backend servers — all API calls go directly from the client to Hyperliquid's API.

## Key Features

- **Real-time charting** with TradingView lightweight-charts across multiple timeframes (1m, 5m, 15m, 1h)
- **Market scanner** with divergence detection, signal scoring, and multi-symbol analysis
- **Technical indicators**: EMA, MACD, RSI, Stochastic, Donchian/Keltner channels
- **Advanced order execution**: cloud ladders, auto TP/SL, cursor-based chart ordering
- **Performance tracking**: P&L, win rate, profit factor, daily/monthly overviews
- **Wallet watching**: track any Hyperliquid address's positions and trades
- **Multi-monitor support**: pop-out chart windows
- **Keyboard shortcuts** for fast execution
- **100% client-side**: no backend, no data collection, keys encrypted locally

## Tech Stack

- Next.js 16 / React 19 / TypeScript 5
- TailwindCSS 4
- TradingView lightweight-charts 4.2
- Zustand 5 (state management)
- @nktkas/hyperliquid SDK
- Vercel Analytics

## Getting Started

```bash
npm install
npm run dev
```

Open [http://localhost:3001](http://localhost:3001), connect your Hyperliquid wallet address, and start trading.
